arts.ttl: Neymar's agent 'meets with Barcelona to discuss his potential return' - just one month after Brazil star re-signed for his boyhood club
arts.sum: The 33-year-old has been searching for a return to form after suffering from an ACL injury which brought about a premature end to his blockbuster move to Saudi Pro League side Al-Hilal in late 2023.

arts.ttl: Neymar scores directly from corner in Santos win
arts.sum: Watch as Brazil striker Neymar scores directly from a corner in Santos' 3-0 victory against Internacional de Limeira in the Paulista championship.

arts.ttl: Santos' Neymar scores directly from a corner in win over Limeira
arts.sum: Watch as Neymar scores directly from a corner in Santos' 3-0 victory against Internacional de Limeira in the Paulista Championship.

arts.ttl: Watch: Barcelona icon Neymar scores directly from corner for Santos
arts.sum: Former Barcelona and Paris Saint-Germain star Neymar Jr. was responsible for a moment of brilliance in his latest outing back in Brazil. As much came during Santos’ meeting with Internacional…

arts.ttl: Neymar responds to jeering fans by scoring for Santos directly from corner – video
arts.sum: Jeering fans from Internacional de Limeira provoked Neymar to score the first olimpico of his career, the Brazil international said on Sunday, after guiding Santos to a 3-0 win in the Paulista Championship. The former Barcelona and PSG player returned to his boyhood club at the end of January and helped Santos to another victory with a hand in all three goals. Neymar assisted the first and the third from corners, both scored by Tiquinho with his head, and he scored the second straight from a corner. Neymar responds to jeering fans by scoring for Santos directly from corner Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Neymar responds to jeering fans by scoring for Santos directly from corner
arts.sum: Brazilian scores during win at Internacional de Limeira ‘They teased me … now I’m the one who’s going to score’ Jeering fans from Internacional de Limeira provoked Neymar to score the first olimpico of his career, the Brazil international said on Sunday, after guiding Santos to a 3-0 win in the Paulista Championship. Neymar scored directly from a corner in the 27th minute, bending in a right-footed shot which struck the far post and ended up in the goal. The 33-year-old also provided two assists for Tiquinho Soares to score a first-half double. “They teased me and I said, now I’m the one who’s going to score the goal,” Neymar told TNT Sports. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Neymar scores direct from corner: 'I meant it'
arts.sum: Neymar showed he still has plenty of magic left after a long injury layoff by scoring from a corner while being jeered by opposing fans.
